ygData.subject: Re: monk moving
ygData.msgSnippet: ... YOu can also get some excellent experience hunting in Erud s Crossing if you are willing to travel and get bound to Qeynos. Or simply start hunting Grown
ygData.messageBody:
At 02:41 AM 9/6/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Steve Danuser <danu@...>
>
>Thanks for the tips, brothers. Oasis has never been very kind to me, but
>perhaps I need to give it a chance. Wisps are good for me now, though some
>of them are starting to con green, which is why I need to find a new
>favorite prey.
>
>__________________________
>Moorgard, monk striving for virtue
>
>Here is a suggestion,
YOu can also get some excellent experience hunting in Erud's Crossing if
you are willing to travel and get bound to Qeynos. Or simply start hunting
Grown Kodiaks in the Commons. Erud's Crossing has a nice ship full of dead
sailors at your level.
Quan of Tribunal
